# Box Mint



This is the beginning to start in this metaverse is acquiring your Starships to be able to compete for your **$CSSR**.

**Box:**

After the game is released, the page will be updated to be able to buy.

![](.gitbook/assets/space-station-g2476da3e7\_1920.jpg)

The sale of **BOX** will be intermittent in order to balance the economy of the game.
